metadata.name: Symphony Inside
metadata.description:
The story was never mine to write,

My movie has plenty of happy scenes but the sad music plays constantly inside.

Why would you want to live where it rains all the time?

What was once a leak 
became a tiny puddle 
is now a house flood 
With the defeat, 
Comes our rhyme,

My life, that will take a flight  
Because for once the world around me looks like my mind.

Hoping the sun comes forth,  
And shines the Symphony inside.



Credits:  
Royalty Free Music by Olexy.
